name: Meltdown (itch) (Fusionnist)
description:
A LUDUM DARE 49 COMPO ENTRY 

This jam's theme is "Unstable". In Meltdown, the theme appears foremost in the game's environment.

Meltdown: reach the top of a crumbling megastructure before its destruction catches up to you.

CONTROLS:

Movement is done with WASD or the arrow keys.

Aim and shoot with the mouse

The R key resizes your screen

The Q key toggles debug view (shows tile edges)

Thanks for playing!

Made by fufu in 48 hours.

https://twitter.com/Fusionnist
